summary: Tested 10 new animation icon presets feature. Backend API returns 10 default statuses with new animations (lantern, dragon, bamboo, coding, fireworks, progress_bar). Frontend has all 21 animation options in dropdown (none + 10 original + 10 new). All 10 new CSS keyframes present on landing page.
critical_code_review_comments: Backend DEFAULT_ICON_STATUSES correctly has 10 entries: ready, building, coming_soon, maintenance, lantern, dragon, bamboo, coding, fireworks, progress
Frontend ANIMATION_OPTIONS has 21 entries (none + 10 original + 10 new + custom_gif)
All 10 new CSS keyframes defined: lanternGlow, dragonFloat, craneHook, bambooGrow, fireworkBurst, typingCursor, dataOrbit, progressFill, templeStack, sparkleRotate
StatusAnimation component in MosaicCommunityLanding.jsx has 20 switch cases for all animation types
StatusAnimationPreview component in LayoutPreviewModule.jsx has matching 20 switch cases for admin previews

success_rate.frontend: 100% (landing page verified with all 10 new keyframes)

context_for_next_testing_agent: 10 new animation presets fully implemented. Admin panel uses LaoPan OAuth for login. Animation dropdown in admin icon editor has 21 options. Previous tests (iteration_118 telegram, iteration_119 icon statuses) updated to account for new defaults.
